titleStmt.title: W. B. Winslow et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6824

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To His Excellency the Governor of the State of the Kentucky

Henry Branham having been fined in the Carroll Circuit Court (upon Indictment for shooting Wm Anderson in sudden affray without Killing) ^at august term 1865^ in the sum of One hundred dollars and Costs -- The undersigned citizens of Carroll County believing the circumstances of the Case recommend it to the interposition of Executive clemency. Pray Your Excellency to remit said fine -- Aug 1865

L, F, Sanders
J G Cline
G. N. Blessing
S Funkhauser
W H Van Pelt
C, N, Stringfellow
L B Wilson sheriff
G G Whiteherst
W Haines
P N Bath
